ISSUE.TITLE: Brevo plugin. BrevoManager.SetPartnerAsync Method should use ILogger.ErrorAsync call
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We have an asynchronous method ErrorAsync in the ILogger interface. It is more correct to use it in asynchronous calls, as in the case of the BrevoManager.SetPartnerAsync method.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7649 Brevo plugin. BrevoManager.SetPartnerAsync Method should use ILogger.ErrorAsync call
